dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And the big winners? Tech giants. Apple's market cap grew by almost $500 billion—half a trillion dollars!

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's not all sunshine though. Some major companies lost a ton of value. DuPont's market cap got cut by more than half.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
